content: this legal text discusses a courts final resolution regarding the division of a hereditary property the court determines that the property can be divided into separate lots with each lot having a specific value the court assigns full ownership of one lot to the defendant and full ownership of another lot to the applicant the court also orders adjustment payments to be made between the parties the court considers an experts report on the value of the properties and makes necessary corrections to the division the court grants reimbursement of expenses and costs to both parties the court determines the allocation of litigation costs and authorizes the transcription of the judgment the text also mentions the succession of two individuals and the value of their shared property the court assigns full ownership of specific lots to each individual and orders payment between them the court shares the costs of the proceedings equally between the parties and orders the relevant authority to transcribe the judgment
